documentText:
SOLAR LAND LEASE AGREEMENT

This Solar Land Lease Agreement ('Agreement') is made and entered into as of January 15, 2024 ('Effective Date').

PARTIES:

Lessor: John Smith, an individual residing at 123 Farm Road, Austin, Texas 78701 ('Landowner')

Lessee: SolarDev LLC, a Texas limited liability company with principal offices at 456 Energy Drive, Houston, Texas 77001 ('Developer')

PROPERTY DESCRIPTION:

The Leased Premises consists of approximately 500 acres of land located in Travis County, Texas, more particularly described as:
Parcel Number: APN-123-456-789
Legal Description: Lot 45, Block 12, Travis County Agricultural District

TERM:

Initial Term: Twenty-five (25) years commencing on March 1, 2024 ('Commencement Date') and ending on February 28, 2049.

Extension Options: Lessee shall have two (2) successive options to extend the term for five (5) years each, upon written notice to Lessor no less than 180 days prior to expiration.

RENT:

Base Rent: $500 per acre per year, payable annually in advance.
Annual Escalation: Rent shall increase by 2% per year.
Signing Bonus: A one-time signing bonus of $50,000, payable upon execution.

PURCHASE OPTION:

Lessee shall have the option to purchase the Leased Premises at fair market value, exercisable upon 90 days written notice.

PERMITTED USES:

- Solar photovoltaic energy generation
- Battery energy storage systems
- Electrical transmission equipment
- Access roads and maintenance facilities

TERMINATION:

Either party may terminate this Agreement upon 180 days written notice for material breach that remains uncured for 60 days.

GOVERNING LAW:

This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Texas.

SIGNATURES:

_______________________
John Smith, Landowner
Date: January 15, 2024

_______________________
SolarDev LLC
By: Jane Doe, Managing Member
Date: January 15, 2024
